com.mlt.task

Interface TaskListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskAdapter

    public interface TaskListener
    Interface that should implement listeners interested in receiving task notifications.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Called to update the main message.
      void onProgress(long workDone, long totalWork)
      Called to update the progress of the task, generally through a progress bar.
      void onProgressMessage(java.lang.String progressMessage)
      Called to update the progress message.
      void onState(State state)
      Called when the task changes the state.
      void onStatusLabel(java.lang.String statusKey, java.lang.String labelKey, java.lang.String text)
      Called to set a status text.
      void onStatusProgress(java.lang.String statusKey, java.lang.String progressKey, int workDone, int totalWork)
      Called to set a status progress.
      void onStatusProgress(java.lang.String statusKey, java.lang.String progressKey, java.lang.String text, int workDone, int totalWork)
      Called to set a status progress.
      void onStatusRemoveLabel(java.lang.String statusKey, java.lang.String labelKey)
      Called to remove a status label.
      void onStatusRemoveProgress(java.lang.String statusKey, java.lang.String progressKey)
      Called to remove a status progress.
      void onTimeMessage(java.lang.String timeMessage)
      Called to update the time message.
      void onTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Called when the title changes.
